response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item offers unparalleled performance and quality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone looking to elevate their experience. Given its unique features and the dedication put into its creation, we believe it's worth more than $12,000. For you, we're offering this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please feel free to reach out. We look forward to potentially welcoming you as a valued owner of this extraordinary product.", "product_price": 15000}
